ABOUT_MSG: Eve Supply Chain is an open source corporate industry planning tool for Eve Online.
FIND_SOURCE_AT: You can find the source and latest releases on Github.
DONATION_MSG: If you like this tool want want to support development, feel free to donate ISK to Zim Zallabim in game.
